statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Stephen Croone and Devin Sibley each scored 20 points as No. 3 seed Furman defeated UNC Greensboro 80-64 Saturday night in a quarterfinal game of the Southern Conference tournament.
article.headline: Furman advances with 80-64 win over UNC Greensboro
article.linkText: Furman advances with 80-64 win over UNC Greensboro
article.story: ASHEVILLE, N.C. -- Stephen Croone and Devin Sibley each scored 20 points as No. 3 seed Furman defeated UNC Greensboro 80-64 Saturday night in a quarterfinal game of the Southern Conference tournament. Furman (18-14) advances to play second seed East Tennessee State in a semifinal game on Sunday. Sibley made a layup with 7:37 to before halftime to give Furman a 26-12 lead, but the Spartans closed the half outscoring the Paladins 17-10. Furman, however, started the second half with a Croone 3 and a layup, Sibley hit a jumper as did Kris Acox and the lead went to 13. Asad Lamot hit a 3 and the Spartans drew to within six with 7:36 to play, but Furman used a 9-2 spurt to put the lead back to 13 with 4:23 left. Kayel Locke led the Spartans with 16 points.
